import SchoolIcon from '@mui/icons-material/School'; import { Alert, AlertTitle } from '@mui/material'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useRegistrationMutation } from '../../features/auth/authApi'; const SignUp = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isCheckBox, setCheckBox] =useState(false) const [registration, {data: userData, error: responseError, isError }]= useRegistrationMutation(); const [error, setError] = useState('') const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const handelCheckBox =()=>{ if(isCheckBox === false){ setCheckBox(true) }else{ setCheckBox(false); } } const onSubmit = async (data) => { if(data?.password !== data?.confirmPassword){ setError("Password No Match") }else{ setError() await registration(data); } }; // useEffect({ // },[userData,error]) if(userData){ if(userData?.status === "error"){ console.log(userData.message) setError() } } if(userData?.status === 'success'){ alert(`${userData?.user.email} Registration Success. Switching to Login User`) navigate('/login'); } return (
{/* */}

); }; export default SignUp;
